title: RIOT PLEASE LISTEN TO MY IDEA
body: I'd like to have this map that has 3 teams other than just 2 teams on the summoners rift. I reckon there could be so much more play making potential and so much fun if there is 3 teams. The third team could have a yellow nexus and also yellow inhibitor. I believe this would be awesome having 15 players in one game and also a extra team to battle against. I am new to this discussion thing so may you just have a read through this? Even though you guys might not like it. Thanks for reading this. RIOT you guys are the best XD.
